Update Guide #

Please backup database and all files/folders before starting to update.

Update Instructions #

Please download the latest file and update the following files & folder of your WIMS install:

  • app/
  • database/
  • public/
  • resources/
  • routes/
  • vendor/
  • composer.json
  • composer.lock

Now you can visit the following url to run the migration

http://yourWIMSURL/commands/update_database?key=youLicenseKeyOrPurchaseCode

Otherwise you will need to update the database by running the following command from main WIMS folder in your terminal.

cd path/to/your/wims && php artisan migrate
1

Request Update #

We encourage you to try updating yourself. However if you need update service, please open ticket for Update Request at Support Portal (update fee $20 - $40) and provide your license key & server details (access to files & database). We will required 1 working day to perform update.
